```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(janitor)
library(fs)
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)


# code used from midterm 1 to download Upshot data
download.file(url = "https://goo.gl/ZRCBda",
              destfile = "master.zip",
              quiet = TRUE,
              mode = "wb")


unzip("master.zip")

file_delete("master.zip") 

# map together all polling results to one dataframe
raw_names <- fs::dir_ls("2018-live-poll-results-master/data") %>%
  map_dfr(read_csv, .id = "source")

```
